# PR Summary

In `dir` scenario `NavigationCmdletProvider.NormalizePath()` method is called a lot of times and do extra work: search /, search \\, again search / (in string.Replace()) and return source path because there is nothing to normalize (no / is in source path.)

The fix is to refactor the method so that use fast return where is possible. Really in most cases we will return on the first condition.

Before the fix 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22290914/60434993-e452db80-9c21-11e9-83ca-59cfe6eb5d94.png)

After the fix the line goes away with ~6% perf win.
